title: Speechless
review: Forever until death really impacted me, and the way the film was written was very unique & the music score was spot on! there's not one movie that I can compare to 'Ghost' because of it's own masterpiece

title: Wow
review: This movie is incredible, the writing was so good and the acting was spot on. One scene took way to long but it felt real as if the hole situation was real, give it a watch and prepared yourself for a masterpiece

title: Classic
review: Wonderful film, not as good as goodfellas but this film has its flaws, a real story telling here as the film is mostly talking but still a classic gangster movie about the casinos

title: Dark As American Beauty
review: Okay now I've been watching movies for years now and I've never felt the way I felt before after finishing this movie.. it had so much raw emotions and it was so well written and acted, I give it a 11/10, it's dark comedy was just like American Beauty.. if you haven't seen this movie, I highly recommend it, it'll change the way you look at love & life
